name: Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games
name_original: Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games
description:
Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games is a family sports-arcade game developed by Behaviour Interactive. It came out on 29-06-2012. It was published by Activision Blizzard. On review aggregator Metacritic, Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games has a score of 22. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Ice Age: Continental Drift - Arctic Games is available on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, PC and Wii. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop and Xbox 360 Store.
It was produced by Jason Fuchs, John C. Donkin, Lori Forte and Michael Berg. It was directed by Michael Thurmeier, Mike Thurmeier and Steve Martino. John Powell scored the game.
